content:
Metalman family

1 Menasses METALMAN                  1754-59 - 1812 #141 (Chaim) {census family 193}
 + Sara                              1760-63 - 1824 #79 (Moses+Hinda)
  2x Dawid WAXSTOCK                  1775-81 - 1847 #352
    + Freidl                         1776-80 - 1840 #111
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Lebel METALMAN                  1783-91
  2x son METALMAN                    Aug 19, 1798 Krakow
  2x Haskiel METALMAN                Oct 6, 1801 Krakow - 1849 #639
    + Reyla MAGER                    c1804
          married Aug 8, 1822 #30
     3o Malka Laja METALMAN          1823 #428 - 1824 #8
     3o Sora METALMAN                1825 #166 - 1826 #128
     3x Menasses METALMAN            1827 #181 - 1890-1900
       + Golda SPINGARN              1823 #42 - 1849 #638
             married May 31, 1847 #22
        4o Sara METALMAN             Feb 28, 1848 #71 - 1848 #139
        4o Czewa (Karolina) METALMAN  Jan 28, 1849 #40 - after 1870
       + Lea FRANKFORTER             Dec 2, 1834 #550
             married Nov 24, 1861 #401,  divorced
    ?? + Nache Baila                 1842 - Aug 21, 1873 #645
    ??  4o Mania METALMAN            May 25, 1873 Krakow
       + Rywka Rachel FRIEDNER       Dec 26, 1854 #516
             married Aug 4, 1884 #63
        4x Chaskel METALMAN          May 1, 1876 #303
          + Anna REBEN               Oct 23, 1888 #785
                married Jul 1, 1909 #136
           5o Franciszka METALLMANN  May 22, 1910 #358
        4x Markus METALMAN           Mar 7, 1878 #152
          + Cecylia Olga EPSTEIN     Apr 26, 1882 #218
                banns Prog.Syn 1903 #131,  married Jan 10, 1904 Podgorze
           5o Ludmila METALMANN      Jan 2, 1905 #64 - after 1930
           5x son METALLMANN         May 6, 1906 #330
           5x Marceli METALLMANN     Feb 29, 1908 #201
           5x Roman Leopold METALLMANN  Sep 24, 1909 #800
        4x Samuel Jakob METALMAN     Oct 23, 1880 #760 - Aug 7, 1881 #375
        4x Szymon METALMAN           Apr 21, 1883 #285
        4o Rela METALMAN             Jun 20, 1886 #367 - Nov 2, 1887 #450
        4x Joachim METALMAN          Jun 24, 1889 #371 - after 1935
          + Regina LIPSCHUTZ         Aug 11, 1890 #484
                married Jun 26, 1913 #117
     3o Hinde METALMAN               1829 #339
     3o Feigel MITTELMAN             1832 #124
     3o Gutel Marya MITTELMAN        1834 #410 - 1835 #334
     3x Motel MITTELMAN              1836 #512
     3o Marya Fradel MITTELMAN       Oct 25, 1840 #448 - 1842 #267
     3o Szeindel MITTELMAN           1843 #261 - 1844 #82
  2o Rela METALMAN                   1803 - Mar 28, 1883 #109
    * Abraham Maier INFELD           Dec 7, 1799 Krakow - 1843-70
          married Aug 19, 1821 #36
        FAMILY LISTING
